title: Science Education Design Utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary knowledge in scientific disciplines and general work experience
context.additional_context: Designing field-oriented science education processes using OER in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Can select at least three science education materials by applying OER search and evaluation criteria
Can develop a science education design model based on OER in at least two stages using literature analysis methods
Establishes collaborative OER utilization strategies to implement and submit team project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
